overview: Sinful Couples Share A Passion With A Stranger  Scene 1: Vanessa Decker, Hugo Antonin & Harry Vakker  Welcome to Vanessa's fantasy. Just, being alone with two men at the same time and being able to control them both...  Scene 2: Gina Gerson, Adam Black & Nick Ross  This is not just a one-time thing... the way that Adam & Nick work together in getting her off could easily become her next addiction.  Scene 3: Angel Piaff, Evelyn Dellai & Max Dior  Angel fantasized about it and Max said it out loud: when they first laid eyes on Eveline, they both knew they wanted her. Just that one time.
title: The Passionate Three
